comment: Obsolete as of 25-Jan-2020. Use ~ rngen1zr instead. The only unital ring with one element is the zero ring. (Contributed by FL, 14-Feb-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
